Location:
- Outdoor air conditioning condenser unit mounted on exterior, adjacent to the building wall.

Observations:
- Gray metal cabinet with rounded top; labels present (Model RP1430J1NA, MFD/FAB 12/2018, serial on label).
- Electrical/warning labels visible; refrigerant listed as R-410A; operating voltage 208/230V, 60 Hz.
- Surface has minor scratches; no visible dents/cracks or corrosion; panels appear intact.

Potential Issues:
- No visible issues.

Recommendations:
- Routine preventive maintenance alignment: clean/coils, check electrical connections, verify refrigerant charge, inspect line insulation, and ensure adequate airflow clearance around the unit.
